</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if the code context is being remote executed from the JIP queue by [[remoteExec]] or [[remoteExecCall]] (when JIP param was set). It is a subset of [[isRemoteExecuted]]:
* Normal remote execution: 
** [[isRemoteExecuted]] - [[true]]
** [[isRemoteExecutedJIP]] - [[false]]
* Remote execution from JIP queue: 
** [[isRemoteExecuted]] - [[true]]
** [[isRemoteExecutedJIP]] - [[true]]
In SP always returns [[false]].</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isRemoteExecutedJIP''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_remoteExecutedJIP = [[isRemoteExecutedJIP]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[isRemoteExecuted]], [[remoteExec]], [[remoteExecCall]], [[canSuspend]], [[remoteExecutedOwner]], [[isUIContext]], [[isGamePaused]], [[isGameFocused]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
